name: It's Wizard Time
description:
Welcome, Students...
Wanna get destructive? Wanna be a total bad###?! Of course you do.

Let's get crackin'. Skulls that is! In this first person (stress relieving) carnage fest, you take on the role of... you! Your goal is to knock out as many evil creatures as you can, with the weapons and maneuvers you have. Wall jump, wall run, slide, it doesn't matter. Just get the job done. I'm sure you can get creative with how you go about it.
Each time you play, the arena switches up with state of the art "procedural generation!" Like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're gonna get.

Try, and try again. Get the best scores you possibly can.


THIS IS STILL A WIP!
If you have any bugs/suggestions please contact me at
Joshimations@gmail.com!
